so I work at a place where I set

I do get a base salary but then I get

februari 23rd they finally listed on

expecting this commission check to come
because the house
may the 12th which was last Thursday and
he usually takes about two to three days

well two to three days came and went

what am I going to do now on Tuesday I

Donald Trump celebration here in

I had a meal that that night the next

someone decides to bring a bunch of

who Yahshua was the Messiah and now

did not curse
was Tiberius and Tiberius is still this

we're only supposed to bless with her
